att.name: createTagCategoryIfNeeded
att.description: Whether or not tag creation should also create the category, if the category doesn't already exist

att.name: categoryEntityTypes
att.description: Specify entity types for category creation. Null = all types. Known allowable types: ClusterComputeResource, Datacenter, Datastore, StoragePod, DistributedVirtualPortgroup, VmwareDistributedVirtualSwitch, Folder, ResourcePool, Network, VirtualMachine, HostSystem

att.name: skipMissingVapiEndpoint
att.description: Determines if a VM with no VAPI Endpoint will error out the Associate/Create workflows

att.name: http503ErrorRetries
att.description: How many times to retry if VAPI encounters a 503 error (vCenter too busy)

att.name: http503ErrorRetryWaitMinSeconds
att.description: For each retry, wait a random number of seconds between the min and max

att.name: http503ErrorRetryWaitMaxSeconds
att.description: For each retry, wait a random number of seconds between the min and max
